caption.p: Phylogenetic tree of the NS1 proteins from H7N1 AI viruses isolated during the Italian 1999–2001 epidemic. The tree was generated using the neighbour-joining method as implemented by the MEGA4 program (Tamura K. et al. (2007), Mol. Biol. Evol. 24, 1596–1599). Green circles identify isolates with a full length (230 aa) protein; yellow triangles identify isolates with a 6 aa C-ter truncation (Δ225–230); red squares identify isolates with a 10 aa C-ter truncation (Δ221–230).
Click here for additional data file.
